mapper.insert: insert into cet4 (student_number, school_name, shool_code, room_number, seat_number, student_name, class_name, exam_number, classroom, `time`, quantum, `rule`) values (#{studentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoolCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update cet4 set school_name = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shool_code = #{shoolCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_number = #{roomNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seat_number = #{seatNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exam_number = #{examNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classroom = #{classroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantum = #{quantum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `rule` = #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where student_number = #{studentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select c.picture url, a.student_number studentNumber, school_name schoolName, shool_code shoolCode, room_number roomNumber, seat_number seatNumber, student_name studentName, class_name className, exam_number examNumber, classroom,a.time `time`,quantum,b.rule `rule` from cet4 a join rule b on b.category=a.rule join pictures c on c.student_number=a.student_number where a.student_number = #{studentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select student_number, school_name, shool_code, room_number, seat_number, student_name, class_name, exam_number, classroom, `time`, quantum, `rule` from cet4
SELECT count(*) FROM cet4 WHERE student_number=#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
